page.title: 11Village Life
page.content: The{traffic lights}are fairly new. They had to have them because it was very dangerous.People could not go round the corner with a pram.They did not have a pavement to walk on.There were lots of lorries shooting round the corner so they put traffic light there. There is a{keep fit}club that meets in the church hall. The{Women's {Institute}- Ningwood and Shalfleet meet outside our area. A Youth Club was started but there wasn't enough support. For a special occasion, like the Queen's Jubilee or the wedding of Carles and Diana the village celebrates in the field down the lane. They put flags round and hold parties. The{Morris dancers}perform outside the New Inn. The church organises various social events.
